meaningMnemonic: If you <kanji>encounter</kanji> something <kanji>difficult</kanji> it's going to result in <vocabulary>disaster</vocabulary>. Especially if you're in a boat. Encountering really difficult water will result in a <vocabulary>shipwreck</vocabulary>! Ick!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
